return node

    def _cut(self, node):
        """Cut a node from its parent."""
        prev = node.prev
        next = node.next
        if prev is not None:
            prev.next = next
        else:
            node.parent.left = next
        node.prev = None
        if next is not None:
            next.prev = prev
            node.next = None
        node.parent = None
